text: Núria Almiron Roig (born 1967 in Sabadell) is a Catalan researcher and PhD in journalism, specialized in communication and power relations. She is a Professor in the Department of Communication of the Universitat Pompeu Fabra (UPF) since 2008 and, previously, of the Universitat Autònoma de Barcelona (UAB). Her main research topics include and merge the political economy of communication, the ethics of mediation, interest groups, critical animal studies, and environmental ethics from a non-speciesist perspective. She is co-founder and co-director of the UPF-Centre for Animal Ethics and member of the CRITIC research group at UPF. She has previously worked as a political scientist and journalist specialized in ICTs, and researched on financial crime. == Selected works == * Almiron, N., Cole, M., and Freeman, C.P.
